mapper.select: SELECT id, orders, title, content, likes FROM tbl_items ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT * FROM tbl_imgs WHERE id=#{id} AND item_id=0
SELECT * FROM tbl_imgs WHERE id=#{id} ORDER BY item_id LIMIT 1, 3
SELECT * FROM tbl_product_info WHERE id=#{id} ORDER BY item_id
SELECT * FROM tbl_schedule WHERE id=#{id} ORDER BY item_id

SELECT t.*, @rownum := @rownum + 1 as rank FROM ( SELECT i.id, i.title, g.img, MAX(i.orders) orders FROM tbl_items i, tbl_imgs g WHERE i.id = g.id AND g.item_id = 0 GROUP BY i.orders) t, (SELECT @rownum := 0) r ORDER BY orders DESC;
